about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into a world of strategy and action with Bacon Tales! Inspired by the classic tale of "The Three Little Pigs," this 2D side-scrolling tower defense game challenges you to protect the Pig Village against relentless waves of wolves. Build your deck, choose your hero, and fortify your village to face epic and intense challenges. In Bacon Tales, every choice counts – and every victory is sweet!

Game Highlights:

  • Original 2D Art: Immersive and charming, Bacon Tales brings the Pig Village and its characters to life with a unique visual style that captivates from the very first minute.

  • Challenging Strategy: Dive into a game that puts your strategic skills to the test. Plan every move carefully to survive the wolves' onslaught!

  • Customizable Decks: Build and customize your own deck of skills and defenses to adapt to different play styles and face threats in unique ways.

  • Powerful Bosses: Face off against formidable bosses in epic battles that demand both strategy and bravery. Only the best will survive!

  • Engaging Storyline: Experience a plot that goes beyond defending a village – uncover the secrets of the Bacon Tales world and connect with its heroes and challenges!

Bacon Tales is more than just a tower defense game; it’s an experience that combines challenging strategy with a captivating story, charming visuals, and gameplay that grows with you. Perfect for those who love a challenge and are ready to defend the Pig Village with all they've got!

Join the journey! Build, fight, and triumph in Bacon Tales!

short_description: Bacon Tales é um jogo de defesa de torre 2D com visão lateral inspirado no famoso conto “Os Três Porquinhos”. O jogador deve defender a Vila dos Porcos contra os lobos. Escolha um herói para ajudá-lo em sua jornada e fortifique a vila para torná-la mais resistente e capaz de reunir mais recursos.
